title: Quanzhi Gaoshou Specials (The King's Avatar (2018))
synopsis: The All-Star Tournament is a three-day event that allows e-sports participants from various professional clubs to display their skills, while also giving casual Glory players the chance to interact with pros in the flesh.
characters: ['Ye, Xiu', 'Su, Mucheng', 'Tang, Rou', 'Chen, Guo', 'Huang, Shaotian', 'Qiao, Yifan', 'Wang, Jiexi', 'Yu, Wenzhou', 'Sun, Xiang', 'Su, Muqiu']
